question: 宝
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Anyone with some <vocabulary>treasure</vocabulary> is going to be a real talker about it. In fact, they act like they're the Egyptian Sun God, Ra, and they have way more treasure than they really do. Making them a <reading>talker</reading> like <reading>Ra</reading> (<ja>たから</ja>), a Takara, if you will.
